name: Little Learners Education Center
description: Educational learning center offering age-appropriate learning and care to toddlers, preschoolers, and school-aged children. Provides child care and day care services with educational programming, field trips, and potty training support. Services include multiple children care and single child care options. Located in London, Kentucky.
source: Verified from Yelp and cross-referenced with multiple sources
